data.message: Please don't speak like that hundred of thousands listen to u learn from u and respect maybe just the beats cause lately your rap has revisited to much negativity..... Do u recall a young lady I believe she was Asian might have been Vietnamese or Japanese but however you influenced her and she looked up to you as to where she mimicked everything you did she make videos on YouTube a derogatory very violence other you suicidal that she like to cut herself then she went on like that for a very long time and you have an impact on people that can change their lives for what they wanted to be I do understand that however your voice is heard and everything that stands behind the God fearing thank you I was going to influence the society in which she hears this so if you can just reach out to those that I'm you know really need you and that love you and that you can say that I think it would be an amazing turn around be considering used to have some crazy talk and your business but anyhow I'm nobody special and maybe I'll send you a call later have a good night oh and by the way if you get a chance you watch the movie mommy don't cry it'll give you a little insight of my life and what I've been through retrospect
